tabTableEditor.header: Manage your data with the familiarity of a spreadsheet
tabTableEditor.description: You donâ€™t have to be a database expert to use Supabase. Our table editor makes Postgres easy to use, even for non-techies. You can do everything right in our dashboard.

tabSqlEditor.header: In-built SQL editor for when you need greater control
tabSqlEditor.description: Write, save, and execute SQL queries directly on our dashboard, with templates to save you time. Run common queries and even build applications using our growing list of templates.

tabAuthRules.header: User management as straight-forward as it can be
tabAuthRules.description: Easily manage your users with Supabase Auth, with email logins, magic links, and third-party logins. Create complex access policies with SQL rules to fit your unique business needs.
